Nightfall Herald Boots
kDesc
Footwear from another age, brought into the present just so you can look good. [#Legal]
Bottes d'un autre âge, ramenées dans le présent uniquement pour vous donner fière allure. [#Legal]
Stiefel aus einer anderen Zeit, für dich in die Gegenwart gebracht, damit du gut aussehen kannst. [#Legal]
Con questo abbigliamento d'altri tempi sarai il massimo. [#Legal]
Calzado de otra época importado al presente para que luzcas de maravilla. [#Legal]
あなたをカッコよく見せるためだけに復刻させた時代物ブーツです。[#Legal]
당신의 패션을 완성하기 위해 이 시대를 방문한 고전 신발입니다.[#Legal]
Footwear from another age, brought into the present just so you can look good. [#Legal]
古人穿的靴子，讓現代的你看來更英挺。[#Legal]
古人穿的靴子，讓現代的你看來更英挺。[#Legal]
Footwear from another age, brought into the present just so you can look good. [#Legal]
